text:
Just going to throw this out there if anyone is concerned about production ready-scale of JS building blocks … we discovered today that (for some reason?!) the Bing search bot is hitting one of our HubSpot websites that uses 3 JS partials 100k+ times a day (more than a hit a second!). And that page is dynamically rendered with 99.9%+ of the traffic going through as live requests to those JS partials.

And our system hasn’t broken a sweat (and we didn’t even notice until we were confused by some surprising metrics weeks later)  :sunglasses:
